Description:
Investors delight.
Set in the ever growing suburb of Corio, this neat residence offers exceptional value for those searching for a home to occupy or a smart rental investment. Boasting ample scope for the new owners to add their own touches or leave as is, the property provides a function floor plan on a generous sized block of 577m2 (approx.).
Comprising three bedrooms, large lounge room, updated bathroom and a kitchen just waiting for a touch up this home opens up plenty of opportunity for further enhancement. Outside ample off street parking is available in the long side drive-way which leads to a single carport while plenty of grassed rear yard is still available to entertain family and friends. Offering a stress free lifestyle located within easy reach to public transport, schools, shops, parks & sporting facilities.
This opportunity won't last long, so be the first to inspect today.
Insights: 14 Halliwell Court, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Outstanding Location!
Enjoy a sought-after lifestyle with this immaculately presented brick home. Prized for its close proximity to shops, schools, Cloverdale Community Centre and public transport, this modernized residence is ideal for those seeking convenience and a low-maintenance living environment. The formal lounge and living/dining rooms cater to casual and formal entertaining, while a smart kitchen features breakfast bench and ample cabinetry. Family-friendly zoning of bedrooms ensures that 3 robed bedrooms are supplemented by an amazing and centrally-located bathroom with free-standing tub. A European laundry provides added convenience. Comfort is assured with ceiling fans, heating and cooling. The innovative style of this home is enhanced by contemporary additions including new carpets and blinds, down lights, floating floorboards and a fresh coat of paint. A double garage, carport and 3 rainwater tanks add further appeal, while a fantastic covered entertainment space is accentuated by fully landscaped gardens. This is an exceptional opportunity to own a property with modern appeal and future potential.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Fresh new look.
This beautiful presented opportunity in the heart of Corio won't come around too often. It is perfectly suited for the first home buyer, small family or investors. With a generous sized block coming in at 616m2 (approx.) this property is sure to not last long.
As we step inside this lovely home we see how much it has to offer, including three bedrooms all with built in robes with the main featuring a split system. A kitchen that holds a lot of potential and a lounge area that is more than generous in size. Stepping outside its hard not to notice the fantastic covered alfresco which will make fitting the whole family in at summer time a spacious event.
Location could not be better, it is situated on the same street as the Northern Bay College, minutes from the Corio shopping centre and sports reserves there is no better time than now to enquire!

Description:
Modern Appeal
Located in the coveted Cloverdale Estate this home has modern appeal to all sorts of buyers from 1st timers to downsizers, to investors and families. With impeccable presentation from the street you will recognise the updates immediately upon entering. Greeted by fresh tiling, then into the vast lounge with new carpet and flows to the dining and kitchen also updated with a new benchtop and sparkling appliances. Head down the hall to the extraordinarily large bedrooms with built-in-robes, that can accommodate any bed and even a desk and the bathroom, toilet and laundry have also been renovated. Easy to maintain and with central heating, an air conditioner plus sun awnings and security cameras for peace of mind. Outside you have a large remote access carport plus a huge double garage with ample space around the back yard completed with colorbond fencing. With schools, shops, transport and easy ring road access you will need to make this impeccable home your next inspection.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Great for the family.
Set across an outstanding allotment of approximately 515m2, this brick veneer classic is the perfect choice for growing families seeking a home with exceptional space & packed with future potential or the astute investor who wants to capitalize in the popular suburb of Corio.
The home has been updated to create a finished product that is low maintenance, and functional for every day family life. Move-in ready yet with ample scope to add your own updates over time. The property includes four bedrooms in total which are spread around the whole home perfect for privacy and all close to the greatly sized and updated bathroom with a separate toilet, a lounge area and a dedicated dining zone provide plenty of space for family living, while the sizeable kitchen is as neat as a pin with plenty of cupboard space.
Boasting a pergola with concreted flooring, and ceiling fans throughout the entire home this charming home is full of extras to provide the new owner an easy and convenient lifestyle. Perfectly located close to the Princes highway, Northern Bay College Campuses and Corio Shopping Centre. This property should definitely be on top of your inspection list, call today before it's too late.
Insights: 6 Caldermeade Road, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 29 other 4 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
So Much More
Whether you are a first home buyer or an experienced investor this home is what you need but best of all representing exceptional value buying. With a modern style and finish the kitchen and bathroom have both been renovated and will make living easy especially with the open living from the large lounge room. Comfortable with gas heating and an air conditioner plus the secure carport converts to a entertainment area that is complete with decking. Furthermore this home offers easy development potential (stca) for future growth/wealth with a wide driveway and being a 607 sqm allotment with the right orientation and the house sitting in the right location. In this lovely locale with the streets own park/playground and with schools, transport, Corio Shopping Central only a short walk away plus the Ring Road and Highway are easily accessible in a couple of turns. With the outstanding value on offer, don't miss this remarkable opportunity.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Quiet court location.
This is a great opportunity for purchasers to secure a beautiful family home nestled on a generous allotment of 535m2 (approx.) in the Cloverdale Estate. Currently occupied by great tenants for $305 per week this property would be a perfect addition for investors. The home itself provides ample off street parking in the double carport and extended double garage at the rear which includes an additional work space. Upon entrance you'll find a bright and spacious lounge room that flows through to the updated kitchen and meals area. Three well-sized bedrooms with BIR'S are situated adjacent to the central bathroom and nearby the large laundry. Located in a well-established neighbourhood, with public transport available just a short walk and the Geelong Ring Road just down the street. Surrounded by multiple reserves the home is easily accessible to schools and just a short 2 minute car ride to the Corio Shopping Centre.

"Family Living In Sought After Estate"
Situated on an enormous 696sqm block (approx) is this stunning family home in the highly sought after Cloverdale Estate. Boasting 3 comfortable bedrooms, main BR with ensuite and walk in robe. Central main bathroom & laundry, spacious kitchen with updated appliances and 2 separate living zones with heating and cooling. Large outdoor all-weather entertaining area plus a single garage or entertainers garage' fit for a king! Within minutes from Geelong Ring Rd for easy commuting and close to schools, shops & public transport, this home will suit investors, first home buyers and developers alike!

Description:
A desirable 692m2 (approx.) corner allotment.
Take advantage of this great opportunity, a perfectly positioned corner allotment with potential to subdivide (STCA), this property won't be on the market for long and is ideal for investors and first home buyers.
This beautifully maintained home features an open and sun soaked dining room located at the front of the property ideal all year around, three bedrooms, a spacious kitchen, a separate living area and up to date bathroom.
Walk outside and enter into a great enclosed alfresco area making entertaining guests a stress free and easy experience. At the rear of the property includes a single car garage with a concreted rear access driveway, surrounded by a high fence around the whole rear of the property.
Situated close to the Corio shopping centre be sure to enquire quickly before you miss out.
Insights: 195 Princes Highway, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
Renovated for Life
Simply stunning renovation and located in a most convenient neighbourhood yet there is so much more on offer. This solid home ticks the boxes being on concrete stumps with aluminium windows and a hidden hardwood timber frame. Better than that, the home now features a stylish and practically renovated kitchen with dishwasher that is open to the main living area while the bathroom too has been transformed with stone liberally used for that quality finish. Also featuring glimmering hardwood timber floors, central heating, an air conditioner and sun awnings on the north facing windows making it a great home in summer or winter. With a large carport behind secure fencing plus ample shedding this home is a short stroll to Corio Shopping Central, schools, transport, medical facilities, leisure centre and also offers easy access to the Ring Road, in one of Geelong's best kept secrets, this neighbourhood offers the lot. Be quick with value like this, it won't wait for you.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Insights: 58 Colorado Drive, Corio VIC 3214 was last sold in 2018 and 174 other 3 bedroom house in Corio have recently been sold.

Description:
This Home needs a family.
With an abundance of natural light, spacious living and ample accommodation, this residence offers plenty of room for the growing family.
From the moment you step inside you will appreciate the flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact, yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy.
Comprising of four great size bedrooms, features include ducted heating and air conditioning, large open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a master bedroom with ensuite.
Step outside to the large entertainment area where you will find the generously sized above ground pool and easily maintained landscaping.
With all the amenities close by including corio shopping centre, local schools, sporting facilities and the Ring Road only minutes away.
This may be the one for you, don't miss your chance to inspect today.

Description:
Endless Possibilities- Growth Zone Opportunity
There is a lot to love about this gem, featuring a well-designed floor plan with an abundance of natural light flooding the home.
The spacious master bedroom includes built in robes, additionally there are 2 additional good size bedrooms. All three bedrooms are serviced by the central bathroom with bath, shower and vanity.
The north facing sun drenched living and dining area features gas heating. The kitchen and meals area fitted with gas a stove, and ample cupboard space.
Externally you will find a low maintenance, and private back yard which is great for a family to enjoy, or to relax with a book and coffee and enjoy the tranquility.
Situated on a 541sqm (approx) allotment in a Residential Growth Zone, this property is walking distance to all facilities & amenities including Corio Central Shopping Centre, Northern Bay College & Public Transport only a stone's throw away.

Description:
Prime opportunity.
Whether you are looking for a family home or want to add to your investment portfolio this inviting and spacious three bedroom home within close proximity to Corio shopping centre, local schools and sporting facilities is for you.
Perfectly positioned and sitting on a superb sized block of (approx.) 625m2, the home opens to a light filled lounge which flows through to the kitchen and meals area.
Accompanying this practical home, are three nice sized bedrooms with built in robes, all of which are serviced by a central bathroom and a separate toilet. Also available is a practical laundry and ample storage throughout the home.
Additional features include, gas heater, wall cooling unit and a single car garage with backyard access perfect for the trailer.

Description:
"Invest Or Occupy - The Choice Is Yours!"
Perfectly positioned in a quiet court, this family home is sure to impress. The home has been extended ensuring plenty of room for the growing family, consisting of two large living areas, one at the front of the home and the other at the rear, the kitchen has gas cooking, plenty of cupboard space, breakfast bar and a formal dining area. Comfort all year round with 2 a/c units, a gas wall furnace and Coonara wood fire. The bathroom is fully updated with a separate shower, bath, and vanity. Glass sliding doors open out to both of the undercover entertaining areas one with its very own fernery, a tandem covered carport & security system. Situated within walking distance to schools, shops & transport. Within a couple of minutes from Geelong Ring Rd and Princes Hwy for Melbourne/Surf Coast commuting. Currently tenanted at $305/week on a periodic lease lends this property to investors or owner occupiers alike.

Description:
Value Packed Family Living
If you have been looking for a totally transformed 3 bedroom family home that you can simply move into & enjoy then I may have found it for you. Completely refurbished & updated from top to bottom this home offers two separate living areas, covered outdoor entertainment deck & enclosed back yard.
Every aspiring master chef will fall in love with the size & space on offer when they step into the kitchen to discover a 900mm freestanding stainless oven, dishwasher, pantry, ample drawers & bench space which overlooks the bright light filled tiled family room & dining area with split system air-conditioner & ducted gas heating. All three bedrooms are carpeted with ceiling fans, the master offers a full ensuite & walk in robes, with built in robes to the minor bedrooms which are conveniently located near the bathroom.
Step outside to find a lovely covered entertainment deck which overlooks the low maintenance, secure back yard, single garage & double carport. Positioned within minutes of the Geelong ring road access, local schools, shopping & medical centres plus the bus route makes this a wonderful family home or ideal investment. Inspection is sure to impress.

Description:
Solid investment.
This unit presents excellent value for those looking for a neat investment opportunity or low maintenance home. Affordability and value for money is what springs to mind when you see an opportunity like this. Currently tenanted until mid 2019 for $195 pw, the property offers a comfortable bedroom with built in robes & open lounge which is overlooked by the practical kitchen. The bathroom contains ample room for a combined laundry, while outside the low maintenance courtyard is the perfect place to relax. Car parking is also not an issue as it also offers a single garage with sliding-door access from the rear yard. Conveniently located close by the Corio train station, public transport and Hendy Reserve while the Corio Shopping Centre and Aldi is just a 5 minute drive away. This residence is an ideal downsizer, first home or investment opportunity. Don't miss this great opportunity.

Description:
Ticks All the Boxes
Stop looking!! This well positioned and immaculate family home has everything on your checklist. Surrounded by other quality homes in a quiet location this property is perfectly positioned in the Rose Park Estate and is located close to all the amenities. Features of this property are 4 great size bedrooms with the Master bedroom having a full en suite as well as a walk-in robe. The 3 remaining bedrooms all have built in robes and are serviced by a central luxurious bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles. Boasting a large formal lounge, huge kitchen with quality gas cook top, wall oven, range hood and double pantry and overlooking the dining and living room with sliding door to the large covered pergola that's just perfect for entertaining. Year-round comfort is taken care of via a split system air conditioner in the living area a wood heater in the family room as well as ducted gas heating throughout the home for the cold winter days. With features including double garage and plenty of room to store the boat or caravan this very desirable home is ready for you to move straight in.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Value & Convenience
Whether you are a first home buyer or a seasoned investor you cannot go past this home for absolute value in a convenient location. Filled with light and with loads of space this home features many updates including the bathroom, gas heater in the vast lounge, gas stove in the sun soaked modern kitchen/meals area and also includes an air conditioner and ceiling fans for comfort. With a large garage and larger carport ideal for all those toys or to entertain with the yard north facing. In a handy location close to Corio Central Shopping Centre, schools, transport, reserve land & parks and also offering easy access to the Ring Road. Move in and enjoy or let out and reap the rewards the choice is up to you but with this value you will need to be quick.
Due Diligence checklist are available at www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Renovated 3 Bedroom Home!
Positioned on a 638m2 (approx) parcel of land within walking distance to shops, primary school, kindergarten and public transport, this home provides the perfect opportunity to invest or occupy!
Offering 3 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, master with air conditioner, all with easy access to the updated family bathroom comprising bath, shower, vanity and toilet.
Striking floorboards feature to the open plan living and meals area which adjoins the renovated kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances including gas hotplates, electric underbench oven and dishwasher.
Outside offers a huge undercover entertainment area, spacious backyard and double garage. Currently tenanted at $270pw, this would make an ideal addition to your investment portfolio or a perfect first home!
*Every precaution has been taken to establish accuracy of the above information but does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent.
